name: Vulpix

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Confused.

flavorText: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. Its tail splits from the tip as it grows older.

strengths: 50 HP is excellent for a Basic common Pokemon
Confuse Ray provides valuable disruption through Confusion status
Evolves into Ninetales, which has powerful energy manipulation
Low retreat cost of 1 allows flexible positioning
Strong against Grass and Steel-type Pokemon
weaknesses: Low 10 damage output makes knockouts very slow
Water weakness is significant with popular Water Pokemon in format
Confuse Ray requires 2 Fire Energy, delaying first attack
Confusion effect relies on coin flip, making it unreliable
No resistance to help with defensive matchups
synergies: Evolve into Ninetales to access Lure and energy manipulation
PlusPower can boost Confuse Ray's damage to more threatening levels
Use Confusion status with Gust of Wind to control opponent's active Pokemon
Defender helps Vulpix survive longer while applying disruption
counters: Squirtle - Water weakness and Bubble paralysis are problematic
Staryu - Type disadvantage and efficient damage
Poliwag - Water Gun exploits weakness effectively
